title:
Do you have any info on the ship that can be seen off Wrightville Beach. It appears to be a Navy type ship and has been moving around the waters since Sunday 6-12.

Thanks.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/07/do-you-have-any-info-on-the-ship-that-could-be-seen-off-wrightsville-beach/
